unique.emptyItemMessage: Add items in <1>{{workspaceName}}</1> by adding them from Add Image/Video button or from your images/videos context menu.

workspace.heading: No Workspace Found
workspace.description: It looks like you don't have any workspaces yet. Click the button below to create one.

trash.heading: No items
trash.description: You haven't sent any items to temporary storage for deletion yet.

shared.heading: No shared items
shared.description: The items you have created and shared with others will be displayed here.

videos.heading: No videos

workspace.others: and others have also joined this workspace.
workspace.noTeams: There are no teams for this workspace...
workspace.inviteteammatesdescription: Create a team and add members to it.
workspace.description: Collaboration made easy with a workspace to share images and videos instantly.
workspace.nameYourWorkspaceDescription: Name your workspace something that will represent its purpose
workspace.uploadThumbnailDescription: Upload a thumbnail to your workspace. Supports JPG or PNG format only.
workspace.invitingCoworkers: Start inviting coworkers and friends to your company.

user.availableSoon: Available in Chrome Web Store soon!

bulkActions.restoreAll: Do you want to restore these items?

install.clickRightSideExtension: Click the extension icon on the right side of the address bar to start using this tool.
install.belowScreenShotButton: Or click the button below to make a screenshot right now!
install.remainPinned: To make accessing the extension easier, please let it remain pinned by following steps below.
install.clickPuzzle: Click the puzzle icon next to your profile
install.clickRec: In the drop-down menu, find Rec
install.clickPin: Click the pushpin icon until it turns blue
install.pinnedDescription: Thanks for adding our extension! To get the most out of this service, staying signed-in is strongly recommended! Keep screenshots synced across devices. Access and share them anywhere, anytime.

image.uploadThumbnailDescription: Upload a logo or avatar to your workspace. Supports JPG or PNG format only.
image.maxFileSize: The maximum file size is 30 KB
image.uploadThumbnailWorkspace: Upload a thumbnail to your workspace. Supports JPG or PNG format only.

video.noAccess: You don’t have the access to this item anymore.
video.chapters: Here you can check and jump to different chapters of this video.

chaptersSection.heading: Chapters
chaptersSection.description: Here you can create and jump to different chapters of your video.

deleteAll.message: Do you want to delete all items forever?

restoreAll.message: Do you want to restore all items?

googleDrive.title: Google Drive Integration
googleDrive.description: You can connect your Google Drive account to save screenshots and videos captured by Rec .
googleDrive.disconnectErrorDescription: Are you sure you want to disable Google drive integration? By disconnecting you won't be able to sync your screenshots.

dropbox.title: Dropbox Service
dropbox.description: You can connect your DropBox account to save screenshots captured by Rec .
dropbox.disconnectErrorDescription: Are you sure you want to disable DropBox integration? By disconnecting you won't be able to sync your screenshots.
dropbox.connectDropbox: You can connect your DropBox account to save screenshots captured by Rec.

jira.title: Jira Service
jira.description: You can connect your Jira account to add new ticket and upload screenshots captured by Rec .
jira.disconnectErrorDescription: Are you sure you want to disable Jira integration? By disconnecting you won't be able to sync your screenshots.

slack.title: Slack Integration
slack.description: You are successfully connected to slack, Now you can share your screenshots to your workspace.
slack.signedWorkspace: You're signed in with slack workspace
slack.slackWorkspace: You're signed in with slack workspace
slack.connectedSlack: You can connect your slack workspace account to share screenshots and videos captured by Rec
slack.disconnectErrorDescription: Are you sure you want to disable slack integration? By disconnecting you won't be able to share your screenshots and videos.

trello.title: Trello Service
trello.description: You can connect your Trello account to add new ticket and upload screenshots captured by Rec
trello.disconnectErrorDescription: Are you sure you want to disable Trello integration? By disconnecting you won't be able to sync your screenshots.
trello.connectedDiscription: You can connect your Trello account to add new ticket and upload screenshots captured by Rec.

profile.title: Profile
profile.passwordValidation: Must have at least eight characters and one number.

deleteAccountModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete your Rec account? Deleting your <1>{{email}}</1> account will delete all your associated data such as your images, videos, folders, and creative spaces, including content you have shared with others. You cannot undo this operation.
deleteAccountModal.privacy: For more information about how we treat your data, please see our Privacy Policy.
deleteAccountModal.confirm: To confirm, please type ''delete my account'' below.

error.resetLinkExpired: Your reset link has been used already or expired
error.minimumLength: Minimum eight characters and at least one number

common.googleRequire: Please, sign in with your Google account to continue...

login.welcomeSubtitle: We are glad you are here!
login.welcomeDescription: To use our cloud-based services designed for sharing and saving your screenshots, please sign in to continue.

continueOptions.title: Or Continue with
continueOptions.playerSubmit: Submit it by Player at ease

videoSave.title: See New Features
videoSave.description: You can now save videos as off animations. Create funny memes to share with friends.

newToolFeatures.title: We Added New Tool Features
newToolFeatures.description: ou can now easily add text to your images, change border colors, adjust text alignment, and more!

chromeExtension.title: Add to Chrome
chromeExtension.subtitle: Save and Collaborate
chromeExtension.description: Save the files to your preferred format and platform. Share with a single click.

folderOrganization.title: Move to Folder
folderOrganization.description: You can now organize your screenshot images into folders for easy access later.

pinToolbar.title: Pin Toolbar
pinToolbar.description: Dock our moveable toolbar on either side of the screen, or float it around any area of the screen.

trimbox.title: Trimbox
trimbox.description: Allows you to easily trim and cut your recording.

setting.accountToBeRemoved: Please select account to be removed
setting.passwordBeforeRemove: Please enter your password before remove your account

preference.alwaysGetLink: Always get shareable links for screenshots uploaded to Google Drive
preference.saveEachFile: Ask where to save each file before downloading
preference.saveEachFileDescription: Note: to use this feature, you need to Allow the extension to manage Downloads when permission request window pops up. And only when this option is turned on, can you specify default subfolder to save screenshots to your local disk. Defaults to the Downloads folder if you don’t specify a subfolder.
preference.addDateAndUrl: Add Date and URL at the top of a screenshot
